maneuvers.narrative: Start out going north on Rua Major Gerardo Mendes toward Rua Tenente Roma.
Turn left onto Avenida Rogaciano Leite.
Enter next roundabout and take the 1st exit.
Turn right onto Avenida Sebastião de Abreu.
Turn slight right onto CE-522/Avenida Washington Soares.
Start out going north on Rua Major Gerardo Mendes toward Rua Tenente Roma.
Turn left onto CE-522/Avenida Washington Soares.
